built_in_tools.name: codebase_search
built_in_tools.description: Search for relevant code snippets in the codebase
built_in_tools.what_it_is: A semantic search tool for finding code
built_in_tools.what_it_does: Finds snippets of code most relevant to a search query
built_in_tools.how_to_use: Provide a search query and optional target directories
relevant_for: Finding implementation details of existing mental models

built_in_tools.name: read_file
built_in_tools.what_it_does: Reads file contents with specified offset and limit
built_in_tools.how_to_use: Provide target file path and optional offset/limit

built_in_tools.name: edit_file
built_in_tools.description: Edit an existing file or create a new file
built_in_tools.what_it_does: Modifies or creates files with specified content
built_in_tools.how_to_use: Provide target file path, instructions, and code edit

built_in_tools.name: run_terminal_cmd
built_in_tools.how_to_use: Provide command to execute and whether it should run in background

mcp_tools.name: mcp_memory_palace_memory_update
mcp_tools.description: Update the Memory Palace with new knowledge
mcp_tools.what_it_does: Stores new knowledge in the memory palace
relevant_for: Storing knowledge about mental model implementations

mcp_tools.name: mcp_memory_palace_memory_reflect
mcp_tools.description: Analyze knowledge in the Memory Palace

mcp_tools.name: mcp_memory_palace_memory_query_contextual
mcp_tools.description: Query the Memory Palace with context
mcp_tools.what_it_does: Retrieves relevant information from memory palace
mcp_tools.how_to_use: Provide query text and context information
relevant_for: Retrieving information about mental model implementations

user_resources.name: mentalmodels.md
user_resources.what_it_is: A markdown file listing mental models
user_resources.what_it_does: Provides descriptions and implementation status of mental models
user_resources.how_to_use: Read to understand which models to implement
relevant_for: Understanding which mental models need implementation

user_resources.name: src/panda_mcp/core/planning/mental_models.py
user_resources.what_it_is: A Python module containing mental model implementations
user_resources.what_it_does: Defines mental model classes and their behavior
user_resources.how_to_use: Examine for implementation patterns and add new models
